WHINE.creator: Wespdx
WHINE.info:
Whine is the very first part in DON and was designed to teach the player the basic gimmicks in a non-intrusive way.
The unsettling song choice is from the incredibly talented "Boards of Canada."

SUNNY.creator: Wespdx
SUNNY.info:
Sunny was my first room, and one of the first decorated rooms in DON.
I wanted to make it feel blinding to offset the darker parts in the level.
Thank you for playing.
